issues.issueMessage:
Field description: The interpretation of the dataset.
For backwards compatibility, the default value is `"raw"`.

Field description: The license for the dataset.
The use of license name abbreviations is RECOMMENDED for specifying a license
(see [Licenses](SPEC_ROOT/appendices/licenses.md)).
The corresponding full license text MAY be specified in an additional
`LICENSE` file.
Field description: Used to specify provenance of the dataset.

Field description: Used to specify the locations and relevant attributes of all source datasets.
Valid keys in each object include `"URL"`, `"DOI"` (see
[URI](SPEC_ROOT/common-principles.md#uniform-resource-indicator)), and
`"Version"` with
[string](https://www.w3schools.com/js/js_json_datatypes.asp)
values.
Field description: List of individuals who contributed to the creation/curation of the dataset.
